name: Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Cappuccino, Pure Vanilla, Caramelized Cedar.Fragrance Description:Vanilla Sky is the smell of comfort in a super sensual gourmand fragrance. Rich warm vanilla notes blend with delicious hints of cappuccino. Caramelized cedarwood lies at the base of the fragrance to give a rich golden warmth to remind you of stunning golden-hour skies..About the Bottle:The SKYLAR bottle was created to mimic a cloud's organic shape in the sky. Intended to represent the beauty of imperfection and celebration of each person's unique qualities. It’s a beautiful square design to sit comfortably in the palm of your hand and elegantly on your vanity or tabletop. All SKYLAR bottles, caps, and boxes are 100 percent recyclable..About the Fragrance:Founded by mom-preneur Cat Chen after her daughter's allergic reaction to her perfume, SKYLAR fragrances are hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin, cruelty-free, vegan, and inspired by the natural landscapes of Los Angeles.
ingredients: Sugar Cane Alcohol Denat., Parfum/fragrance, 1,3-Benzodioxole-5-carboxaldehyde (heliotrope note/safe synthetic), 1,4-Dioxacycloheptadecane-5,17-dione (musk note/safe synthetic), 1,6-Nonadien-3-ol, 3,7-dimethyl (freesia note/safe synthetic), 1-Propanol, 2-[1-(3,3-dimethyl-cyclohexyl)ethoxy]-2-methyl-,propanoate (musk note/safe synthetic), 2(3H)-Furanone, dihydro-5-pentyl (coconut note/safe synthetic), 2H-Pyran-2-one, 6-heptyltetrahydro (fruit note/safe synthetic), 2h-Pyran-4-ol, tetrahydro-4-methyl-2-(2-methylpropyl) (Lily of the valley note/safe synthetic), 3-Cyclopentene-1-butanol, .alpha.,.beta.,2,2,3-pentamethyl (woody note/safe synthetic), 4H-Pyran-4-one, 2-ethyl-3-hydroxy (brown sugar note/safe synthetic), Benzaldehyde, 3-ethoxy-4-hydroxy (powdery note/safe synthetic), Benzaldehyde, 4-hydroxy-3-methoxy (gourmand note/safe synthetic), Benzoic acid, 2-hydroxy-, (3Z)-3-hexen-1-yl ester (floral note/safe synthetic), Cyclododecane, (ethoxymethoxy) (woody note/safe synthetic), Cyclopentaneacetic acid, 3-oxo-2-pentyl-, methyl ester (floral note/safe synthetic), Ethanone, 1-(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8-octahydro-2,3,8,8-tetramethyl-2-naphthalenyl) (cedarwood note/safe synthetic), Naphtho[2,1-b]furan, dodecahydro-3a,6,6,9a-tetramethyl (amber note/safe synthetic), Cedarwood Oil (woody note/botanical) , Propanol, oxybis (solvent/safe synthetic), Tetradecanoic acid, 1-methylethyl ester (solvent/safe synthetic), aqua/water/eau.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply your fragrance to major pulse points such as your wrists, neck, and below the ears.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Eau de Parfum Spray

reviews.review_title: Great Vanilla scent that doesn’t leave a headache
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this! Especially if I mix it with my YSL Libre intense. I get compliments all night! The vanilla in this isn’t overpowering or that super sugary scent that seems to be popular with folks right now. I think it has a lot to do with the subtle coffee scent it has in between. It’s warm and inviting maybe a bit enticing, perfect for dates or a cozy night in.  Travel size lasts a long time and is incredibly handy when you need a quick touch up.   Lasts a decently long time but would probably need to reapply mid day or night depending on how poignant you want the scent to be on your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my granddaughter last year, and she liked it so much, that she asked me to get it for her birthday in December. It smells so pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a warm vanilla gourmand lover, SKYLAR Vanilla Sky is a great pick! I was afraid it would be too oriental for my liking, but the caramel and cappuccino notes are stronger than any oriental vibes. It's an intense, heavy, medium lasting scent; usually on me very sweet gourmand fragrances don't smell as heavy so I would wear this on any occasion, but most people most likely will prefer this as an evening or winter fragrance. I was expecting some lightness from the name (Vanilla Sky), but I'm not disappointed in what I found.

reviews.review_text: I am obsessed!!! This scent is so yummy. It’s a warm vanilla scent!!! I used up one roller ball, so I got another. I will splurge on a big bottle next. I love it for my everyday purse! i wear it everyday before work!!! It’s a vanilla-caramel scent!!! LOVE IT!!!

I put this on, and all I smelled was fresh laundry type of smell. I thought maybe it was my clothes, but it was this perfume. I put more on, and still, all I get is this fresh laundry scent. I was so confused by this. I was hoping it would make me smell like a yummy vanilla, but I guess not.

Otherwise it smells exactly the same!   Smell is a soft vanilla, but wrapped in cashmere that’s the best way to describe it, this is an amazing Fall scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally do not like vanilla/gourmand/sweet scents at all but I received a sample of this perfume and immediately fell in love and purchased the full size bottle. It is a high-end, elevated vanilla scent that smells more adult than your standard sugary sweet vanilla. It smells like how wearing a cashmere sweater while curled up under a blanket on the couch feels. Just super cozy and warm and happy and a little bit fancy and expensive too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually love this scent, it kinda smells like the eos vanilla cashmere lotion. But it smells really good, I think it pairs really good paired with the eos lotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to for Vanilla. Clean. No residual chemical scent. Some may not like it because it is very subtle and doesn't have much endurance. It is also a good scent to mix with another.  Top: Cappuccino, Sweet Orange, Bergamot  Middle: Vanilla, Spanish Jasmine, Cinnamon  Base: Caramel, Amber, Sandalwood, Cedar  It's one of those scents that you keep coming back to on your wrist all day long.  Hints of caramel and coffee in the dry down.  Very safe. Simple...not luxurious.  But very gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get migraines from most perfumes, but the vanilla sky worked out perfect for me. It is a light scent, and I have gotten compliments from people that the scent is subtle but nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not picky when it comes to longevity; I'm perfectly happy with 2-3 hours. But this? 5 to 6 sprays (I normally use 2-3 with other perfumes!!!) of this WATER lasts 20 MINUTES, literally. No exaggeration. Maybe 30-40 minutes if I douse my clothes in it (slight hyperbole -- 5 to 6 sprays also). And even in those minutes, the scent is SOOOO light that you have to put your nose right against your skin/clothes to smell a HINT of something sweet. I smell very, VERY slight vanilla, other vaguely sweet stuff, but NO coffee/cappuccino. Oh, and in the first 2 minutes, straight up alcohol.   If I used this everyday for a month, I'm 100% sure I can use up the whole full-sized bottle.  If you want a vanilla perfume that actually lasts (3-4 hours on me), projects something other than H2O, and actually smells like vanilla go with Vanilla 28.

reviews.review_text: I really tried to like this product but it has this unpleasant sunscreen smell after it settles no matter how i use it. Really sucks bc i know they make amazing products but tbh just a miss for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Reminds me a bit of B&BW Warm Vanilla Sugar, yet different and much better! Very sweet, creamy, warm, and cozy. Has a soft and sweet woody cedar scent that develops more during the dry down and just a hint of coffee. Such a pretty fragrance! The longevity and projection are good, I can smell it most of the day, but might apply a little more if I were going out later. I think this one is a safe blind buy for vanilla lovers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HELLO FALL!!! I just received my bottle of Skylar's Vanilla Sky perfume - holy wow. This is exactly the deeper version of the true gourmandy vanillas that i LOVE! In comparison to Fresh Cream Vanilla Cashmere by Philosophy (my favorite vanilla), this is it - but with added toasty notes from the cappuccino and cedarwood!!!! Fabulous for fall - this will be my new everyday instead of Fresh Cashmere Warm Cashmere to get that final test, but I see myself making this my new vanilla!  Scent - 10/10 Longevity - 7/10 as of now, expected though with a vanilla Season - I'll be using it year round - but loading it on for the fall winter~!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s like a sweeter version of Vanilla 28! I’m sure they’d both smell great layered together. I love it!

reviews.review_text: I am on my second container. Cozy and warm, with a hint of coffee. It doesn’t last all day on me, but I love this scent. The vanilla is less falsely sweet and more deep than others.

reviews.review_title: RUINED THE TOP OF MY DRESSER
reviews.review_text: It pains me to rate this perfume so low because it does genuinely smell great, despite the fact it's not super long-lasting, but the reason I'm rating it so low because this perfume MELTED THE TOP OF MY DRESSER. I honestly cannot tell you exactly how it happened... it may have been something about the actual glass bottle, or my other theory is that the perfume leaked out of the bottom (which shouldn't be happening regardless) and then caused a melted rectangle imprint on the top of my dresser along with a number of stains from the oil. This also didn't just happen once- the first time I concluded something else caused it and didn't think too much of it, then later a more prominent spot right under the bottle showed up confirming it was in fact the perfume. I cannot say anything actually bad about the perfume itself since I've been using it for around a year and do like the smell, but this should not have happened and I am very upset about it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really surprised when I tried this as I was expecting a vanilla and coffee-heavy scent based on the comments. This is not it. It’s a blend of several gourmand notes (largely a “milky” note, which is probably what is supposed to be the cappuccino. along with cinnamon and a touch of vanilla), plus citrus and jasmine to round it out. The former provides warmth, but It’s the latter that makes this smell clean.   Overall, this perfume reminds me of what a warm, clean cashmere scarf would smell like. It’s sexy and feminine, and unlike anything I’ve ever smelled before.   Longevity is quite decent - it starts off quite strong and slowly fades into a beautiful skin scent. Since it’s on the heavier side, this scent would definitely be better suited for the colder months. But this would make a stellar signature scent.

reviews.review_title: go-to. holy grail of clean vanilla scents!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample, have been wanting to try it for a long time but honestly I didn’t expect to smell anything “special”…vanilla scents are so common, and I haven’t smelled any vanilla scent that is exceptional in any way until THIS!  I wish I could find the right words to describe how pleasant smelling it is, or how it made me feel just smelling it, this is the best I can do…I sprayed some on the sample card and took a sniff…it was the most pleasant sensory overload, I have never experienced a smell like this, it was so complex and unique…it’s like fresh air, and ice cream, but there’s a “grown up” sort of vibe that settles in after that initial creamy vanilla smell, probably the subtle hint of cappuccino….but when the cedar hits—oh man….if you know what freshly carved or sanded cedar wood smells like then you get me….it is one of my favourite smells on the planet (my father was a carpenter/furniture maker). This combination of notes was invigorating and fresh yet warm and comforting, sweet but earthy, gourmand and somehow still mature. If you love vanilla, I can’t see you disliking this…it’s like the ultimate vanilla scent… But if you are intrigued by the smell of cedar, this is worth sampling or even blind buying in my opinion. I also LOVE that this is clean, and hypoallergenic. The stay power is remarkable too, I used 3 sprays and can still smell it after almost 12 hours! Price is totally reasonable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved vanilla scents, but find many smell really chemical-y or are far too light. This one is a beautiful warm vanilla scent that sticks around nicely without being too light (as in light enough it needs to be re-applied) and definitely not overpowering (where people start wondering if you are bathing in it).  It is the perfect in-between that gives me a beautiful vanilla scent throughout the day. Totally in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this with a previous order, and again when I ordered the Skylar Discovery Set. I will for sure order a rollerball and maybe the two-piece set in the future. In my experience this is a great all-around vanilla for people who are sensitive to perfume. I have chronic migraines; scents that are intoxicating at first can in a few hours become unbearable. I don't have that problem with Vanilla Sky. Its notes are delicious, yet mild and not 'controversial'; for example, Vanilla Woods by 7 Virtues has a smoky note that can become extremely annoying on a bad day. Vanilla Sky doesn't have anything like that. It's true that it doesn't last long, maybe a couple of hours; for people who are sensitive to scent that can be a big advantage as that means the scent will fade more quickly if it happens to trigger them that day. Only downside is I'm sure I'll go through these quickly due to reapplying and spraying on clothes. This is a scent to wear if you want everyone - and I mean everyone, this scent is not a controversial one - to think you smell good, and you don't want to trigger your (or anyone else's) headaches.

reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a sample from pinch me for free. I absolutely love the smell and freshness of this perfume. I highly recommend this product especially if you are wanting to wear something light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla, I love coffee, and I love this perfume. Perfect for everyday wearing or even for a date, because you will smell like a delicious desert, but without overwhelming. Every time I wear it I feel very cozy and calm. Definitely recommend for people loving sweets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this perfume- it’s become my everyday wear now. It’s subtle and sweet, nothing too overwhelming. Definitely recommend for those that like sweet but not floral smelling perfumes!

reviews.review_title: Great Clean, Vegan, Cruelty Free Warm Vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely warm vanilla. Very wearable and very basic, but in a good way. If you like vanilla gourmands and are looking for a clean/vegan/cruelty free option, this is for you. If you don't like any of those things, then this is not for you. Purchased the rollerball and will probably purchase the full size once I run out. My only complaint is that I hate the packaging, it looks like someone designed it in Microsoft Word lol, like, why??? Other than the packaging, this is the best clean, vegan, cruelty free vanilla I've ever found.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this skylar vanilla sky parfum in the rollerball version. The packaging seemed to be quality. I absolutely love the scent. The scent lingered as long as a normal perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this perfume is magic. It is buildable but also a good standalone scent. It’s like a more sophisticated vanilla sugar from bed Bath beyond. I would highly recommend this for anyone who likes a sweet warm vanilla smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The SKYLAR Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum has a pleasantly sweet vanilla scent. It reminds me of the holidays. I think the scent is perfect for the cooler fall & winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very delicious smelling scent. Closer to the scent of fresh baked almond cookies/almond croissants rather than vanilla

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good. The whole collection seems too last forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very vanilla and nice sort of caramel or amber mix but within twenty minutes it became a bit of a nose tweaker so this is a pass though it smells quite nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised at this scent!! It lasted way longer than I expected. The combination of the notes used really work well together for me. I will definitely consider this product next time I am making a purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a smaller roller bottle of this and OMG! SO sweet and light. It's not over powering like most vanilla perfumes are. It's very lightweight smelling, and lasts a good few hours/half a day before needing to reapply. Maybe if I used the spray it would last longer, idk I haven't purchased the whole bottle yet. But I will be! This doesn't have that fake vanilla smell, it's very natural, sweet. I love it. So does My teenage niece!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a free sample of this that came with a another purchase and personally did not like it. It’s not as sweet as I thought it would be. When first sprayed it has an overwhelming rubbing alcohol scent and when it dries down it’s more of a light floral vanilla. As a gourmand lover I got no caramel and macchiato notes as described. Not for me but definitely recommend for the floral scent lovers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this Skylar - Vanilla Sky! I've always been super picky about scents. And very limited with what I like or can wear. The scent has to be just right or I am overwhelmed!  The light sweet vanilla smell is just so delicious! Perfect wear for daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just tried a sample of this and it’s GORGEOUS. not an overly sweet vanilla that leaves a headache but very fragrant and sweet. The note descriptions are spot on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this scent, but it wouldn't be an everyday one for me. It' a sweet warm vanilla, reminds me of fall scent , or a warm vanilla latte with brown sugar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good basic vanilla scent I think what actually makes it great is that it’s clean and not filled with chemicals. I do think it smells a little boring on its own although mixed with another scent it could be really good. I like it I don’t love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Vanilla and this roll on smelled great. It has a soft smell that I really enjoy. I like that it is hypoallergenic and safe for sensitive skin. I carry it in my purse and will definitely buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent! It isn't heavy or overpowering. It's great worn alone or as a base for mixing with other scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very faint scent that does not last even an hour.  I'm hoping I will be able to exchange it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with the simplicity. Just a simple colored roller ball perfect for on the go. It has a very light and soft smell. Sweet as per usual with vanilla scents. It lasts quite awhile as well. A usual 8 hour shift for me and I still go home smelling pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely smells like a soft vanilla but isn’t as gourmand as described - intensely creamy coffee, caramel and vanilla. Instead, it is more of a vanilla floral with a hint of a latte spice smell. The gourmand aspects are more obvious in the dry down and project better in the heat. The ever present background floral keeps this sort of fresh and airy. Longevity depends on the person. This lasted longer on 2 of my relatives ,wheareas I was constantly having to reapply. This DOESN’T stain clothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not usually a big fan of perfume but I love the smell of vanilla sky, it’s not really heavy and still lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this scent! It is a mild vanilla scent without being too sweet, it is extremely long lasting and compliments a day time look or evening look. It really can be worn for any occasion which I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite rollers for mixing! I love pairing this beautiful vanilla scent with a really masculine fragrance for a perfect combination! This scent isn’t overbearing and I can wear it on my pulse points with no issues!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Skylar Vanilla Sky is the sensual way to smell like vanilla but without overwhelming sweet after taste. The parfum last all day and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this scent. I was worried this would be one of those strong alcohol scents but this was actually nice. It has a nice smoky vanilla scent. It goes well for daily wear and can be worn for nicer events.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!!! It smells great and is super convenient in the to-go version.  I really loved this and will purchase in the future.

reviews.review_title: Clean and cruelty free to go scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my fav to go spicy perfume. It has rollerball applicator, which is so easy to use. Just put how much you want. It's not too strong not too light just perfect for my day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is one of my favorite is smells so good,if the style boho had a smell this will be it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has been years since I've worn perfume because I have sensitive skin and had a horrible allergic reaction to another brand. But Skylar Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum didn't cause my skin to break out and it smells lovely! The main fragrance is vanilla with a lighter hint of cappuccino and cedar to give it some warmth. I like that the scent is noticable but not overly strong; I hate it when someone can smell you coming. The rollerball is the perfect size for stashing in your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Skylar Vanilla Sky rollerball perfume! It is a very light and cozy scent. Not too strong. I just wish it lasted longer. I’ve already recommended this perfume to fellow friends who don’t like a strong scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a warm beautiful scent I really love it it’s perfect in the roller ball so I can take it anywhere

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the roller bottle as a free sample from pinchme. It has a strong warm vanilla scent. I highly recommend it you love vanilla you will love this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great not too heavy received as a free sample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the roller bottle as a free sample from pinchme and I am so pleased with this product! It's smells great. Not too light, not too strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a  very vanilla smelling scent, it's light warm and longlasting. Coworkers complemented on how great I smelled.

reviews.review_title: Skylar Vanilla Sky Roll On Perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells divine. It's like I walked into a bakery but I walked out smelling like the vanilla extract. It's not overwhelming to the senses but you will smell delicious all day. My husband loves it cause it absorbs into my hair & he says it smells even better on my skin. Definitely another signature scent I've added to my collection. I even got my mom into this smell since she loves anything with coffee in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample. Great smell and last pretty long. Smells like pure vanilla . Very pleasant. Last pretty long for a roll on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I received this in the mail, I wasn't sure if I would like using a roller for perfume. Using the roller is nice because the chances of putting on too much are slim (only would happen if it was on purpose). The scent is very nice as well. It is more of a soothing vanilla, and it is not too strong but definitely still noticeable. Once the one I currently have runs out, I will be getting another one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Skylar Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum has a great warm scent. The rollerball container is perfect for placing it in a bag or your car for easy reapplication. The packaging of this perfume was high end and appealing. I found the fragrance to be inviting but not too strong, although it did last all day. This is now my go to fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SKYLAR VANILLA SKY ROLLERBALL smells really refreshing not to strong smelling, easy and convenient to use and carry in my purse to freshen up on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the convenience of the rollerball and I can keep it in my car or my purse to freshen up with on the go.  The sweet scent of vanilla, cappuccino, and cedar.  I get a lot of compliments on this scent.  It's great for a fall or winter perfume.  It is a little pricy so it's more of a treat item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a promotion, and I honestly have to say I LOVE IT! The smell is soft and long lasting. I get compliments every time I wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this perfume! It lasts super long as I go through school and then work after. Everyone compliments the scent and asks for it to get for themselves. It smells majorly like vanilla (of course,) and has a hint of muskiness which makes it even better. I use this almost every day wish it wasn't so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been enjoying this Skylar Vanilla Sky rollerball.  This is a warm and spicy scent that goes on strong and then fades to a softer scent. It seemed to last about 3 and a half hours.  The vanilla really stands out to me.  I have a perfume that smells similar but it irritates my skin but this doesn't.  I like that this is hypoallergenic and safe for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this scent a lot at first. It wasn’t too sweet but still very vanilla and wearable. Later that day (day one) I was at work comparing it to another fragrance, when a coworker pointed out how “smoky” my own fragrance smelled. Once she said that, I couldn’t stop smelling the smokiness and it kind of ruined the scent for me. Not sure how crazy that sounds but I would recommend this for anyone looking for a good vanilla scented fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SKYLAR VANILLA SKY ROLLERBALL truly blew me away with the scent and how long lating the fragance lasts. I normally do not like vanilla parfumes but with this one the vanilla is warm and spicy and so pleasant. Its easy to apply and use just roll it on and it stays where you apply it, it does not run at all. I like that i can apply this and even if wearing a mask i can still smell it. My mum also likes this as it does not bother her allergies. I really love this fragance!

reviews.review_title: SKYLAR Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: skylar Vanilla Sky Eau de parfum It smells great and lasts all day I exceed my expectations I recommend it.pinchMe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like vanilla scent, but it's hard to find a brand that isn't too much - too strong, superficial smelling, etc. This one is nice - light vanilla scent that's not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received Skylar vanilla sky way de perfume rollerball from Pinchme. I must say I’m pleasantly surprised. It smells beautiful. It has a light vanilla scent. When I wear it I get many compliments. A lot of people have said it smells clean. Like getting out of a shower after using body wash. The scent isn’t overwhelming. I keep it in my handbag and use it most days. I’m very happy with the product.

reviews.review_title: Romantic and stylish fragance that you will love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I try this example by PINCH ME, I honestly expected the fragrance to not be good, vanilla based fragrances are usually very sweet but I liked this one and I was positively surprised. Its vanilla notes are balanced, it is a subtle aroma that you like, it is oily roll on but it does not leave the skin greasy, it is soft and subtle, it has surprised me a lot, I recommend it, this perfume is worth it if you are a romantic and delicate woman, you will love it.
I thought this was going to smell like bath and body works warm vanilla sugar. It is 1000 times better. It’s mature, yet soft. I love this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have other skylar perfumes and they work really well with my skin chemistry. I got this vanilla sky perfume and I love it as an everyday perfume. It smells like vanilla, obviously, but it’s not overwhelming or too sweet. It lasts about 6 hours on my skin before it mostly wears off and becomes faint. Having the rollerball makes it easy to reapply. Perfect scent for day time/work/school.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am enjoying  this  Vanilla Sky roller ball. It stays in my side purse  at all times. It dispenses just the right amount at a time and the scent lasts quite a while. It slowly fades into a soft warm smell. When you first put this on it is very bold with vanilla, however it is not overwhelming.  My husband really likes this on me, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample from pinch me in exchange for an honest review. I really did enjoy the scent. It's not something that I would wear daily, but definitely on the days I'm feeling vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with the scent I have the roller I did not feel it lasted as I wish it did but the smell had me at the first spray. I need to try the spray to see if that works for me longer. 3 stars for not staying on longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of vanilla scents, but I don’t like them if they are cloyingly sweet like vanilla frosting or cupcakes. This Skylar Vanilla Sky is lovely. It isn’t a super sweet vanilla. It’s a cozy warm scent that is perfect for every day. I really like this because it has a natural vanilla scent, along with a hint of a coffee scent, and a little bit of caramel when it dries on my skin. The only thing that is a bummer is it doesn’t last long on my skin at all. Within an hour I don’t even smell it. But since I have the rollerball, I just keep it in my purse and reapply throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is really amazing like amazing! It literally smells like a vacation and a bottle but in the best of ways. It reminds me of taking a vacation to Costa Rica out in their beaches. I also like that the ingredients are very friendly how ever I just wish that the scent would last longer on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SKYLAR Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum has such a wonderful and unique scent that is perfect for any occasion. I have generally used more floral scents but found this to be a nice change that I will continue to use. The light and airy scent truly does combine the vanilla, cappuccino and cedar scents into a lovely combination. I think if you give the Skylar scent a try you will continue to use it in the future. Fun, flirty and new...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got my free sample from Pinchme in exchange for a free and fair review. I was not a dan od this scent to be wearing on my person. I would have selected another Sephora brand. I gave the scent to a friend. It was a nice product it just was not for me personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla is such a versatile scent. It can be innocent or sensual depending on what it is mixed with. Skylar Vanilla Sky is definitely on the sexy end of the spectrum. Vanilla is the dominant note, with cappuccino a close second. The caramelized sage adds complexity. I do wish the scent lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely love this scent. One thing though is that i wish it lasted longer. I do smell hints of the cappuccino which honestly drew me in more than just any pure vanilla scent would. It’s very lovely. Although, again. One star off for staying power

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not in to pure vanilla scents. I will gift this to my sister that loves vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so lovely, but unfortunately it just doesn’t last. Perhaps it is the rollerball that doesn’t omit scent for long versus the spray, but my review is for the rollerball. It’s a lovely warm vanilla scent. Not like cookies or anything but something more feminine. I love wearing it and it’s easy to apply, but after an hour or two I can’t smell it anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fascinated with this fragrance. I hadn't had the opportunity to try it before but I loved it. I am a lover of the smell of vanilla, it is one of my favorite fragrances and the one that goes best with my body pH and this has been the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love warm vanilla fragrances, this is amazing. So delicious and lingers all day. If you love the OG Ariana Grande perfume, this is that minus most of the floral notes. So so so delightful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this smell. The vanilla notes were so delicate. I just wished it stayed on. I felt like after an hour or so the fragrance was gone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the roller ball and I have to say that this smells so good on paper, but on my skin it disappeared completely. I much prefer MAC Creme D'Nude or Replica by the fire place, different scents but similar situations or vibes for me and those actually have scent to them.   I'd almost think of the no makeup makeup looks but worse and with fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! It really has a warm vanilla scent. The scent remains at least 8 hours after applying. Would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the roller ball travel size from Skylar , however the scent is a bit too much when it comes to the vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this fragrance it'd smells super delicious

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!  I got a free sample of this to try out and OMG!!!  It's so delicious smelling I fell in love!  It's not super strong but has a very noticable aroma that sticks for a while!  Hours after even in the wind down I'm getting compliments and asked who smells so good?  Great perfume 5 stars fully recommend!  Price is but extravagant for some wallets but boy it lasts and is a grand perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is so in intoxicating, my husband loves it! I use the roller ball so it's super easy to glide on. The scent isn't overpowering and I always receive compliments when wearing it.

reviews.review_title: Buy this Vanilla Sky scent so pretty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty I get a lot of compliments from family and coworkers. I normally do not enjoy a vanilla scent but this one is clean and worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great but I feel like it doesn't last long. Maybe because I received the roller ball and not an actual bottle. I received as a free sample. But I do enjoy the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the citrus opening note was off putting at first (personally just not big on citrus perfumes) but THEN the coffee to a soft vanilla scent came and it was just the right vanilla perfume I wanted. I've been on the hunt for my perfect vanilla fragrance and this is the one. my husband approves! I was worried based on reviews with longitivity but for me I rolled it on in the evening and still smelled it on me the next morning! so no problems there just make sure to moisturize your skin before it will keep the scent lingering! I will be buying the bigger one soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe it's because I got the rollerball but the scent faded really fast, maybe in an hour or 2. I love the smell, though! It reminds me of sugar cookies yet also spicy. It does make my nose tickle like I might sneeze but I can't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells absolutely amazing! I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Skylar's Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum is a wonderfully sweet and slightly warm scent. The scent can be a tad sweet (for my nose), but the cappuccino aroma helps balance it out a bit. I love the sleek, minimalist packaging and portability of the 0.33 fl oz rollerball I received. There is a muted cloudy image on the underside of the label, which is visible if the label faces away from you. I marked down one star since the scent doesn't tend to linger on my skin for more than a few hours.
perfectly mixed vanilla which is sweet but not to sweet. it smells great and lasts all day on the skin, even after working out. very impressed and will continue to purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh. I absolutely adore this perfume. The bottle is simple and beautiful, the scent is the perfect vanilla, it’s my go to scent right now. Why did i give it 3 stars? The sillage. I spray this and about 5 minutes later it’s gone. I can still smell it faintly really close to the skin but that’s about it. I don’t totally mind this as i love to have my favorite scents reserved for like… an up close situation with people (iykyk), but i’d like to know i actually applied just an hour later. Maybe it’s the way it works on my own skin, maybe it’s the perfume, but i’m a tad broken hearted either way. Recommending anyway if you want something “better than skin” and non offensive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is seriously the warmest, sweetest, most refreshing smell!! I have the roller ball and i only use a tiny bit on my neck and wrists and it last all day! I get so many compliments about it! This would make a great gift for any woman who loves sweet refreshing smells! The packaging is gorgeous and sustainable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love SKYLAR VANILLA SKY ROLLERBALL really bad. I love Vanilla and thought this was going to be a hit. It was a miss for me. It did last a while without being over bearing I just did not care for the aroma on me. My 9yo daughter however liked it more so I gave it to her.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful fragrance, my new favorite scent! I’m usually drawn to anything vanilla, and even though Skylar Vanilla Sky isn’t as vanilla as other fragrances I own (I smell more of the cappuccino note but it’s definitely a new favorite. I also don’t detect much spiciness which I appreciate, in my opinion it’s sweet, creamy and very feminine.

reviews.review_title: A cruelty-free & hypoallergenic way to do vanilla!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally prefer fragrances with fruity or floral notes, but this Skylar Vanilla Sky Rollerball is a really lovely departure from my usual scents.  I agree with the other reviewer who said it’s more complex than your usual vanilla fragrance.  Of course you notice the vanilla at first, but then the cedarwood base kicks in, and it’s very warm and comforting like a luxurious and cozy candle on a chilly autumn evening.  As far as longevity goes, the scent did fade after an 8 hour day out and about, but the good thing about rollerballs is how portable they are for when you need a quick touch-up.  The big differentiator with this brand though is that the fragrances are cruelty-free and safe for sensitive skin.  (You’d be surprised at how many luxury brand fragrances are not cruelty-free!)  On top of that, Skylar is female and BIPOC-founded, so even more reason to celebrate!  I will definitely be coming back for more from Skylar!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells mature yet flirty. Love the was it melds with my own skin. Doesn’t feel tacky and strong enough to not need a spray bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells divine! It’s a nice, sweet vanilla scent. It doesn’t smell really fake or harsh. I’m really sensitive to scents and this one doesn’t bother my allergies or give me a headache at all. It has a nice longevity as well. I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have multiple spicy/gourmand/vanilla perfumes and they all seem to have much more depth than this one. It fell very flat to my nose. I ended up giving it to a friend who loved it so I’d just say definitely don’t blind buy this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this Skylar Vanilla roller. it smells so great. Easy to use and convenient. I received it as a free sample and I am in love. Definitely worth it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was pleasantly surprised by both the scent and longevity of this. It’s not just a flat vanilla. It has a twist of berry to it. I found that the scent was uplifting and comforting. It lasted a few hours as well. For those looking for a vanilla scent with a bit more complexity - the Skylar Vanilla is a great option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice vanilla scents - not too strong, but noticeable and clean. Not overly sweet which is nice, but still on the sweeter side of things since it is vanilla centric

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample. I normally don't care much for vanilla scents because they are too sweet smelling but thos one was perfect. I also liked the rollerball. Went on well. Didn't apply too much or too little product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I receive this product from Pinchme in exchange for my honest review. This scent brought me back to Jr. High/high school days. It's not to strong, but just enough to where the scent lingers a bit. i received quite a few compliments when I tested this out. I won't be using in everyday but I will keep in stock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the fact this is a clean perfume. I love to smell good, but am trying to be more conscious about what I am putting on my body. You get the most true full bodied sweet vanilla with this perfume, and the lasting power is pretty decent. It is a great perfume to layer with others as well if you'd like that extra dimension of sweetness. It truly is exactly as you'd imagine. Sweet yummy warm vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ~ Greetings, this perfume is not for me, however, it may be for someone else that likes sweet, warm, rich, and gourmand scent in perfume. It's utterly sweet, and the vanilla is very heavy in scent. I feel perfume is a personal choice; vanilla is not my scent.
